Welcome to the Aviation Flight Tracker!

 1. Search Flights:
 - Type the 3-digit IATA Code of the airport to list all flights.
 - Select a flight to view its details, including Destination, Terminal, Gate, and Delay.
 - Save flight details to the device by clicking the "Save" button.

 2. View Saved Flights:
 - Click the "View Saved Flights" button on the main page.
 - See a list of flights saved to the device.
 - Click on a flight to view its details.
 - Delete a saved flight from the database using the "Delete" button.

 Enjoy tracking your flights with ease! Safe travels! ✈️
